name: gatsby-transformer-screenshot
description: Gatsby transformer plugin that uses AWS Lambda to take screenshots of websites
author: David Beckley <beckl.ds@gmail.com>

scripts.build-lambda-package: npm run prepare-lambda-package && cd lambda-dist && zip -rq ../lambda-package.zip .
scripts.prepare-lambda-package: rm -rf lambda-dist && mkdir lambda-dist && cp lambda/package.json lambda-dist/package.json && cp lambda/screenshot.js lambda-dist/screenshot.js && cp lambda/index.js lambda-dist/index.js && cd lambda-dist && npm install --production
